title: Is it possible to submit pages to be archived on the Internet Archive in bulk? - Quora

response.answer_text: This doesn't completely answer your question, but this will get you part way there. Their submission form ends up making a request in this format for a URL you submit through the web form: http://web.archive.org/save/<url> where <url> is the fully qualified URL of the page you want to archive. So you can write a batch script to iterate through a list of URLs and make GET requests to each one using the syntax above.
